marketplaces.name: claude-code-burst
marketplaces.description: Supercharge your Claude Code with power-ups

files.README.md:
# Claude Code Plugin Marketplace

Plugin marketplace for Claude Code.

## Plugins

| Plugin                                 | Description                |
| -------------------------------------- | -------------------------- |
| [macos-notify](./plugins/macos-notify) | Native macOS notifications |

## Usage

```bash
/plugin marketplace add /path/to/this/repo
```

Or via GitHub:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add strikebu77/claude-code-burst
```
files.plugins/macos-notify/README.md:
# macos-notify

Native macOS notifications for Claude Code.

## Events

| Event                 | Notification        | Sound |
| --------------------- | ------------------- | ----- |
| Claude needs approval | "Action required"   | Blow  |
| Claude waiting        | "Waiting for input" | Pop   |
| Task done (>3s)       | "Done (duration)"   | Glass |

## Requirements

- macOS only

plugins.name: macos-notify
plugins.description: Native macOS notifications when Claude Code needs you or finishes work
